name: BioBot
description:
Welcome young padawan, here you are stuck and trying to survive with a bot which is absolutely offensive weaponary but still requires time to cool off too.
        And you're a guy who can defend against anything at you. So basically you're on defence bots on offense, Enjoy :).

Press - 1 to shoot normal Bullets
Press - 2 to shoot Grenades
Press - 3 and draw on the screen to use Shield
And standard controls for movement and shoot.

Beware over usage of weapon will cause issues to bot so look out for the bot's orb color.
